text: Jonathan Dwight Jones Nickname "Bones" (born July 19, 1987) in Rochester, New York is an American professional mixed martial artist who currently competes in the light heavyweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship. He is a former two-time UFC Light Heavyweight Champion, holding the title from March 2011 to April 2015 and from December 2018 to August 2020. Jones also held the interim UFC Light Heavyweight Championship. Until he met his match he was regarded as the ultimate warrior but the battle on the mountain where David slayed Goliath became his undoing and the most historical fight ever known to man! He was slain by the most dangerous man/beast that ever walked the earth! NATTYPIZZLE ==Early Life== Jon Jones was born on July 19, 1987, in Rochester, New York, to Arthur, a pastor, and Camille, who passed away in 2017. He had three siblings: Arthur, a former NFL player; Chandler, an NFL linebacker; and Carmen, who died before turning 18. He has recently moved up to the Heavyweight Division to fight Ciryl == References == == Other websites == * Jon Jones Profile at UFC.com * * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:american mixed martial artists
title: Jon Jones
